name: Devileroo
description:
Devileroo is game in which you play as a delivery guy in this isometric city world, going from one restaurant to another to pick up the food orders and delivering them. You play against the clock avoiding cars, trash cans or fences that will make you reconsider your way. The money is important too so you have to manage it to be capable of buying the foods at the restaurants.

Made in a 48h game jam - Guerrilla Game Jam - 2018 by

Hernán M. González Calderón (@HernanMGC)

Jose Manuel Ruiz (@darkiruiz)

Victor Montero (@VMonty)

Alex Martín (@hialexmartin)

Rubén Flor (@RubnFlor)

Victor Torres (@VictorTorresMa5)

Rubén Cepedello

Almendra Fernández-Maldonado

### CONTROLS ###

WASD: Movement and acceleration

E: Accept

On Gamepad:

Right trigger: Accelerate

Left joystick: Movement

A: Accept
